H0.text: The competition for food among primary consumers increased during the hot summer drought experienced by the grassland ecosystem.

H1.text: Nutrients cycled through the system at a faster rate was most likely what happened in the grassland ecosystem during the hot summer drought.

H2.text: Less solar radiation was able to enter the system during the hot summer drought experienced by the grassland.

H3.text: Secondary consumers became extinct during the hot summer drought that occurred in the grassland ecosystem.

A4.text: Drought can be triggered by a high level of reflected sunlight

A5.text: Because of the lack of these watering holes, many grazing animals are forced to migrate due to the lack of water in search of more fertile lands.
